de.tubs.cs.iti.krypto.chiffre
Class Tables

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--de.tubs.cs.iti.krypto.chiffre.Tables
public class Tables
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds the uni-, di- and trigraph-tables which are useful for breaking ciphers.
